extends EventListener

onDiscovery

@Deprecated
void onDiscovery(GridDiscoveryEventType type,
                            GridNode node)
Deprecated. 

Deprecated in favor of new unified event management. See the following:
  • GridEvent
  • Grid.addLocalEventListener(GridLocalEventListener, int...)
  • GridDiscoveryEvent
  • GridEventType

Notification for grid node discovery events.

Parameters:
type - Node discovery event type.
node - Node affected. Either newly joined node, left node or failed node.
